summary:
Build dApps & blockchain projects with the fastest EVM chain - Velas offers an extensive foundation used to implement dApps and decentralized projects that boast market-defining speed and equal convenience of use.

 Velas EVM - The fastest and most accessible blockchain to tailor smart contracts and build dApps.

 Velas eBPF - The fastest and most accessible L1 Blockchain to tailor smart contracts and build dApps.

 Carbon Neutral - A carbon neutral blockchain based on an energy-efficient DPoS mechanism.

 Use Cases - See the solutions brought to life with Velas capacities

 dApps - High-performance dApps focused on user privacy and flexibility

 DeFi - Insightful solutions that bring decentralized finance up a level

 NFT - Top-quality NFT art that brings in much-needed monetization

 DEX - Firmly secure, unhackable decentralized exchange solutions

 Metaverse - Immersive metaverse projects with a reliable digital edge

 Marketplaces - Load-resistant marketplaces that outrun traditional competitors

 P2E Games - Play-to-Earn game concepts implemented at the max potential

 Web 3.0 - Forward-minded projects developed with the Web 3.0 principles

 Ecosystem - Velas offers an extensive foundation used to implement dApps and decentralized projects that boast market-defining speed and equal convenience of use.
